website_summaries.verdict: Classic BareTraps leather. women's riding boots with detailed stitching and ankle-buckle.
pros: 16-inch boots made with quality leather and rubber soles for improved grip
Rich tan color goes well with most casual wear
Comfortable and warm in all but the most extreme conditions
Wide calf for better general fit

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the fit!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my calves well for the most part, although there is a bit of extra material at the back of the calf. I was worried that the calf area would be too tight. I am still breaking them in, although they were not uncomfortable from day one. They are just a tad bit squeaky.Overall, I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dorrie

customer_reviews.title: Not all Baretraps are created equal.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Baretraps for years and needed to replace a pair that is worn out. They no longer make my favorite style so I tried these. I’ve always purchased a 7.5 to give room for thick socks but these fit like an 8-8.5. The shaft was several inches taller and cut right at my knee bend making them uncomfortable to wear, and the foot portion was tight across the top but loose in width and length. Overall a terrible fit. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They fit well, the color is beautiful! Exactly what I ordered. They have a rubber sole that makes walking in them extremely comfortable in wet conditions and snow and ice. I wear them with my jeans and leggings.
customer_reviews.author: MzDew

customer_reviews.title: because they looked very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The foot was far too narrow, and I have narrow-normal width feet. The calf circumference was also smaller than expected. I am on the thin-normal weight range, and could not zip these up. It's a shame, because they looked very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for wet weather.
customer_reviews.text: I love these and purchased them to replace a very similar style from the same maker that wore out.
customer_reviews.author: F. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots since last winter. They are extremely comfortable and I love the style!
customer_reviews.author: M. Shingler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I also have big calves and am always worried about if a shoe will fit around them. These were no problem and they looks great. I love BareTraps!
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for thicker calves.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were cute but a little too small on my calves.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful feel and comfortable. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sole

customer_reviews.title: ❤️👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. They are soft, comfortable and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa E Adams

customer_reviews.title: I love it, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love it, just what I was looking for. If I had gotten a half size they would fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yay they are comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised how comfortable these are; so happy I purchased them
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: One shoe fit...
customer_reviews.text: The left boot was really tight around the top of the foot near the ankle. Since they are not real leather I don't expect them to stretch much. The material felt really fake. Overall just disappointed, returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were just perfect and I have worn them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my granddaughter and she liked the color but the fit was poor
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughter and she liked the color but the fit was poor. She didn’t like the feel of the leather either so we sent them back
customer_reviews.author: Susan M Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Material is cheap
customer_reviews.text: They’re true to size but the actual boot/calf area is extremely wide!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the fit and quality of these boots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BareTraps Women's Bt Yvonna Riding Boot
product_meta.description: The baretraps yvonna perfectly balances fashion and comfort with trendy details and comfortable elastic features. these boots are built with a trend-savvy ankle strap that adds the finishing touch to a beautifully classic boot.
